announcement.message: Sovryn has just lifted transaction limits (hooray!). This means you can now take any position size. Please be aware, however, since the limits were only just removed, liquidity in the system may be low initially.

optin.title: Success
optin.text: You will now receive email notifications when your positions are close to liquidation, and if a position has been liquidated. You may opt out of these at any time

unsubscribe.title: You are now unsubscribed from email notifications
unsubscribe.text: You will no longer receive emails about margin calls or liquidated positions. You can re-subscribe to these notifications at any time.

explain.title: HOW DOES IT WORK?
explain.earn: Earn SOV by depositing liquidity into the USDT/RBTC or SOV/RBTC liquidity pools
explain.datesUSDT: USDT/RBTC dates: 1st April 2021, 12.00 UTC - 1st May 2021, 12.00 UTC
explain.datesSOV: SOV/RBTC dates: 13th April 2021 12.00 UTC - 11th May 2021 12.00 UTC
explain.depositUSDT: Reward pool for depositing USDT: 25,000 SOV
explain.depositRBTC: Reward pool for depositing RBTC: 25,000 SOV
explain.depositSOV: Reward pool for depositing SOV/RBTC: 75,000 SOV (15k /week plus extra 15k for 1st week)
explain.sharePool: Your share of the pool is calculated by:
explain.liquidityAdded: liquidity added by you * number of blocks held
explain.totalAdded: total liquidity added * number of blocks held

liquidity.rewardPool: Your Current Share Of Reward Pool*
liquidity.noAsset: You have no {{asset}} liquidity mining events yet.
liquidity.rewardPoolNote: *For weeks that are still in progress, this number may go up or down

arbitrage.popover_p1: Users can help balance the Sovryn AMM (automated market maker) when arbitrage opportunities arise. Currently, up to {{fromAmount}} {{fromToken}} can be swapped for up to {{toAmount}} {{toToken}}.
arbitrage.popover_p2: This is {{earn}} {{toToken}} more than the market price.

footer.title: Powered by <0>Bitcoin</0>
footer.notice_1: Only you control and have access to your wealth, any actions you take could cause a potential loss of funds.
footer.notice_2: Particularly please be sure to check all transaction fee prices before proceeding as third party wallets may automatically present high fees.
footer.notice_3: Please visit our <0>FAQ</0> if you have any questions.
footer.notice_4: If you’re new to DeFi, here is the <0>wiki</0> on how to use SOVRYN.
footer.notice_5: For latest updates or discussion, head over to our <0>Discord</0> server.

analyticsDialog.title: Analytics Settings
analyticsDialog.message_1: We would like to collect some analytics data from you in order to improve user experience. If you would prefer to opt out of this, please unselect the checkbox below and click 'Confirm'.
analyticsDialog.option: Allow Sovryn to collect analytics data
analyticsDialog.message_2: Please refresh the page after confirming to ensure the analytics are disabled.

verified.privateSale: You have been given whitelist access to participate in the FISH Origins sale.
verified.publicSale: You have been given access to participate in the FISH Origins sale.

accessCodeVerificationStep.notVerified: Your wallet address has not been whitelisted for todays FISH Origins Sale.

privateSale.title: Important Information about the the FISH Private Sale Process and Terms

information.1: You have been whitelisted for the Blockchain Whispers' Private FISH Sale! Welcome and thanks for your support!
information.2: FISH available for purchase per wallet: {{rbtcAmount}} rBTC, equivalent to {{fishAmount}} FISH - Do not transfer more than this amount. Amounts sent in excess of this amount will be automatically returned to the address from which they were sent.
information.3: FISH purchased as part of this sale, will vest linearly for 10 months. FISH markets are available on Sovryn and up to 40% of liquidity mining rewards will commence in Q3. FISH can be used to vote in BabelFish governance as soon as it begins to vest. For any questions, please ask the community in Discord or Telegram channels.

privateSale.checkboxText: I have read and understand that I am responsible for my own Sovrynity

publicSale.title: Important Information about the the FISH Public Sale Process and Terms

information.1: Welcome to the BabelFish FISH token sale. Thank you kindly for your support!
information.2: FISH available for purchase per wallet: {{rbtcAmount}} rBTC, equivalent to {{fishAmount}} FISH - Do not transfer more than this amount. Amounts sent in excess of this amount will be automatically returned to the address from which they were sent.
information.3: Half the FISH purchased will vest upon completion of the sale, the other half will vest linearly for 10 consecutive months.
information.4: FISH markets are available on Sovryn and up to 40% of liquidity mining rewards will commence in Q3. FISH can be used to vote in BabelFish governance as soon as it begins to vest. For any questions, please ask the community in Discord or Telegram channels.

publicSale.checkboxText: I have read and understand that I am responsible for my own Sovrynity

mobileNotReady.p1: The Sovryn user experience is not yet optimized for mobile.
mobileNotReady.p2: Register your email to hear when our mobile version is ready!
mobileNotReady.p3: Until then, why not try the desktop version?
mobileNotReady.successText: We will contact you as soon as Sovryn Mobile is live.

1.title: You Are Connected!
1.p1: In order to borrow/lend and trade on Sovryn, you must first enable your Bitcoin by transferring them to your rsk wallet.
1.p2: You do this by creating a unique btc address that pegs to your RSK address, supercharging your BTC into RBTC.

2.p1: Your unique BTC address has been created, transfer BTC to receive RBTC in your RSK wallet.
2.important1: Do not deposit any non - BTC assets to this address, otherwise your assets will be lost permanently
2.important2: Please allow upto 15 mins for the transaction to process
2.contactUs: For support please join us on

fastBtcDialog.title: Top Up FastBTC
fastBtcDialog.subtitle: Deposit BTC to receive rBTC in your wallet
fastBtcDialog.note: Always be sure to check the BTC deposit address as FastBTC gets updated

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.point1: Do not deposit anything other than BTC
instructions.point2: Do not send more BTC than the MAX limit
instructions.point3: Allow up to 60 mins for the transaction to process
instructions.point4: If rBTC is not visible on your wallet after 60 mins open a
instructions.chainId: Make sure your wallet is set to correct network. Liquality Wallet requires dapp refresh to detect network change.

fiatDialog.title: Buy <0>RBTC</0> with fiat
fiatDialog.explanation1: Transak allows you to buy BTC which is then converted to <0>RBTC</0> and sent to your wallet
fiatDialog.explanation2: Make sure you do not exceed Sovryn deposit limits as Transak allows purchases above our max deposit limits

instructions.point1: Do not buy more BTC than the MAX limit above
instructions.point2: Allow  15 mins for the transaction to process
instructions.chainId: Make sure your wallet is set to correct network. Liquality Wallet requires dapp refresh to detect network change.

vestingDialog.title: Withdraw Vesting
vestingDialog.subtitle: This transaction requires rBTC for gas.

claimForm.title: Available Rewards
claimForm.note: Claiming your rewards automatically vests them for 10 months with a 1 month cliff.

explainer.earnSOV: Earn SOV by depositing liquidity into the USDT/BTC liquidity pool
explainer.rewardPoolUSDT: Reward pool for depositing USDT: 25,000 SOV
explainer.rewardPoolRBTC: Reward pool for depositing RBTC: 25,000 SOV
explainer.yourShare: Your share of the pool is calculated by:

explainer.yourShare_D: total liquidity added * number of blocks held
explainer.airDrop: Rewards will be deposited into liquidity providers' wallets on or before 8th May 2021

engage.line2: Don’t have a wallet? Sovryn recommends <0>Liquality Wallet</0>

topUp.title: Top up <0>RBTC</0>
topUp.line1: You will need <0>RBTC</0> in your wallet to buy SOV and pay gas fees on RSK Mainnet.

pendingUser.title: Confirm Transaction
pendingUser.text: Please confirm the transaction in your {{walletName}} wallet

txStatus.title: Transaction Status
txStatus.abortedLedger: Make sure "Contract data" is set to "Allowed" in your Ledger app settings

p1.title: April  50k SOV BTC/USDT Pool Loot Drop
p1.text: Become a revered and respected Sovryn Liquidity Provider by adding your crypto to the pool. The longer you keep funds in the pool the more SOV you will earn.

p2.title: April  75k SOV BTC/SOV Pool Loot Drop
p2.text: The SOV/BTC liquidity pool is open, giving you the chance to take part in our biggest Liquidity Provision giveaway yet.

p3.title: 30K SOV SOV/RBTC Pool Loot Drop!
p3.text: Take your share of 30K SOV rewards by providing liquidity to the SOV/RBTC pool. Additional rolling weekly rewards will be announced shortly.

p4.title: 35K SOV ETHs/RBTC Pool Loot Drop
p4.text: In the first week, $1.2 million worth of SOV will be distributed to liquidity providers of the AMM. This super loot drop will last 7 days. Some quick maths indicate that early pool entrants will get somewhere in the region of 3000%!! The largest yield on ETH today. There will be further rewards for subsequent weeks which will be revised and announced towards the end of each week.

mining.title: Liquidity Mining
mining.text: Sovryn waves goodbye to centralised services that conventionally provide market-making. Fees generated by trading are distributed amongst liquidity providers as a reward, in exchange for facilitating trades and swaps.

marginTrading.title: Margin Trading
marginTrading.text: Margin trading allows you to use assets in your wallet as collateral for your margin, to borrow more assets or to increase your initial position.

swap.title: Swap
swap.text: Swap Frictionlessly between listed tokens. The Sovryn Decentralized AMM ensures no one can take advantage of you creating a trade

liquidity.title: Market Making
liquidity.text: Sovryn’s layer 2 solution operating on the Rootstock (RSK) Bitcoin side-chain facilitates the frictionless usage of financial primitives for multiple assets across multiple chains to further Satoshi’s vision of monetary sovereignty beyond simple peer to peer transactions

lending.title: Lending
lending.text: Earn a passive income by lending your assets directly to borrowers or to margin traders and decrease your exposure to wider market performances and fluctuations. Sovryn’s non-custodial solution keeps you in control of your funds, and you are free to withdraw your assets at any time.

stake.title: Stake & Vote
stake.text: The Sovryn protocol has hard-coded incentives for long-term growth. Token holders who stake their SOV receive a pro-rata share of the revenue that the platform generates from various transaction fees when they participate in the governance of the protocol by voting.

claimOriginBanner.text: Your SOV is ready to claim!

description.title: Uniswap Liquidity Pool Escrow
description.line1: Escrow pool participants will receive a 5% reward, plus a pro rata share from any trading fees generated in the SOV/ETH pool after any Impermanent Loss is covered by Sovryn, returning a minimum of 60% APY.
description.line2: 100% of SOV held in trust by Sovryn on behalf of users in the Uniswap escrow liquidity pool will be returned to users wallets 30 days after launch of the pool.
description.line3: The 5% reward plus the pro rata fee share will be credited to user wallets in SOV, 30 days after launch of the pool.
